about:
Hi! I'm Alinus! I'm a Computer Science Student! I'm aspiring to be a Software Developer!
I love coding, gaming, and reading light novels! The design of this portfolio was inspired by Zenless Zone Zero's UI!
bio: I'm currently a student of Ateneo de Manila University
contact:

My phone number is +639613985127.
My Github is Goodymind and my LinkedIn is Alinus Abuke
mission:
I aim to be a Software Developer that creates software that can help people in their daily lives.
I also want to continuously improve my skills as a programmer and as a person.

acad:
I'm Currently a Computer Science Scholar in Ateneo de Manila University!
I was a former student of and member of the robotics team of Valenzuela City School of Mathematics and Science.
extra:
Miguel: An Interactive Visual Novel Murder Mystery Game where you take the role of an investigator searching for the culprit inspired by 3 Filipino novels
ConNEXT: A Python code flowchart generator. Creating organized flowcharts of Python code.
PhySim: A Physics Simulation Software designed to help highschool students learn Angular Physics Concepts
extra2:
Karaoke: A simple Karaoke app made where everything is programmed in Java, even the art!
Prop Hunt: A 2d 2-Player Networking Game where two players take turns hunting each down in Hide and Seek
Form'r Glory: My Entry for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam: Roll of the Dice. Players choose which enemies appear on the dice that they will face in battle.
